idea-plugin.name: Eevee Progress Bar
idea-plugin.description:
This is the Eevee Progress Bar for IJ based IDEs based on the Nyan Progress Bar by Dmitry Batkovitch. It display a running Eevee for the basic bar and random eeveelution for the indeterminate one.
